name: Bostonstrong567's Icarus Mods
author: Bostonstrong567
description: A collection of mods for Icarus, including More DropShip Slots and Eye Colors Expanded.

mods.name: More DropShip Slots
mods.description: Increases the number of drop ship slots available.

mods.name: Eye Colors Expanded
mods.description: Adds over 20 new eye colors for character customization.
